Title: Provides that the failure to report a release of hazardous substances is a class A misdemeanor
Summary: Provides that the failure to report a release of hazardous substances is a class A misdemeanor and any such subsequent violation shall be a class E felony.
LawCode: Add ยง71-3705, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to notification of the release of hazardous substances
